What is the relationship between the performance of multilingual systems and whether the target languages are shared or distinct in the context of transfer learning?
What is the impact of having shared versus distinct target languages on the performance of multilingual systems in the context of transfer learning?

The complication arises because when target languages are distinct, maintaining performance across multiple languages becomes challenging. Fine-tuning a model for one language can negatively affect its performance on others, making independent training more effective in such cases.
